content.text: Match ends, Valencia 2, Hércules 0.
Second Half ends, Valencia 2, Hércules 0.
Royston Drenthe (Hércules) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jeremy Mathieu (Valencia).
Attempt saved. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Attempt missed. Royston Drenthe (Hércules) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Tiago Gomes.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Jeremy Mathieu.
Foul by Royston Drenthe (Hércules).

Substitution, Valencia. Joaquín replaces Éver Banega.
